Immediate steps to take: improve background checks, raise the age limit to purchase guns, limit the capacity of ammunition magazines, renew a federal ban on military-style assault weapons, expand red flag laws, and hold gun manufacturers liable when their negligence costs lives.

I'm grateful to those around the country today marching and speaking out through their own grief and trauma, calling for meaningful, commonsense gun safety reforms. I’m with you—I feel your pain and frustration—and I will keep pushing for meaningful change. #MarchForOurLives
